duck: Mandrake the Magician, a comic strip character
Mandrake (plant), a plant of the genus Mandragora

mandrake definition: a Mediterranean herb ('''Mandragora officinarum''') of the nightshade family with large ovate leaves, greenish-yellow or purple flowers, and a large usually forked root resembling a human in form and formerly credited with magical properties.

wiki.text:
__NOTOC__ 'Mandrake' may refer to:
* Mandrake (plant), a plant of the genus Mandragora
* Mandragora (demon), in occultism
* Mandrake Linux, former name of Mandriva Linux, a computer operating system
* Mandrake, the NATO designation for the Soviet aircraft Yakovlev Yak-25

'Mandrake' may also refer to:
